lang.dashboard_desc_perf: This dashboard shows information about tables, queries, and cpu.
lang.dashboard_desc_resources: This dashboard shows information about memory, space, and locks.
lang.panel_desc_memory: This panel shows shared memory usage for the database server.
lang.panel_desc_num_sessions: This panel shows the number of connected sessions for the database server.
lang.panel_desc_network_reads_writes: This panel shows the number of I/O calls for network reads and writes.
lang.panel_desc_disk_io: This panel shows disk I/O wait time. The panel requires Informix 12.10.
lang.panel_desc_os_memory: This panel shows memory usage for the operating system (OS). The panel requires Informix 11.50.
lang.panel_desc_transactions: This panel shows the number of transactions for the database server.
lang.panel_desc_space: his panel shows the free space and used space for each dbspace.
lang.panel_desc_locks: This panel shows the number of locks for the database server.
lang.panel_desc_toptables: This panel shows the tables with the most reads.
lang.panel_desc_cpu: This panel shows the user and system CPU time.
lang.panel_desc_toptables_modify: This panel shows the tables with the most inserts, updates, and deletes.
lang.panel_desc_sql_actions_total: This panel shows the total number of rows processed, inserted, updated, and deleted.
lang.panel_desc_sql_actions: This panel shows the number of rows processed, inserted, updated, and deleted per second.
lang.NotYetImpl: On this page, the OpenAdmin Tool cannot display information for a database server with more than one non-English database locale. The database server contains more than one non-English database locale.
lang.CouldNotRetrieveConnectionInfo: Could not retreive connection information for the database server.
lang.ServerBlocked: The database server is blocked. OAT cannot retrieve any other status information.
